ch.supertomcat.bh.queue

Class CalculateRateTimerTask

  • java.lang.Object
    • java.util.TimerTask
      • ch.supertomcat.bh.queue.CalculateRateTimerTask
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.lang.Runnable

    public class CalculateRateTimerTask
extends java.util.TimerTask
    This timer sets a flag in the Pic to true, causing the Pic to recalculate the downloadrate. The is used to, recalculate the downloadrate only each 10 seconds.
